characteristics.slogan: Inhabits the freezing waters of the Arctic Circle!
Also known as the 'Pink Dolphin'

characteristics.distinctive_feature: Large dorsal fins and communicate using whistling
characteristics.slogan: Stays in groups from 15 to 2,000 in number!'

characteristics.distinctive_feature: A beaklike snout and rounded "melon" or forehead
characteristics.habitat: All of the world's oceans, rivers in Asia and South America
characteristics.slogan: Can reach speeds of up to 25 mph!

characteristics.most_distinctive_feature: Rounded black beak and tall, curved dorsal fin
characteristics.slogan: Communicates using whistles, squeaks and clicks!

characteristics.estimated_population_size: Unknown, but status is Least Concern

characteristics.most_distinctive_feature: The glowing blue rings on the yellow skin
characteristics.predators: Seals, birds, eels, and larger fish

characteristics.slogan: There are around 300 different species!

characteristics.distinctive_feature: Long snout and brooding pouch on the male
characteristics.habitat: Shallow tropical waters and coral reefs
characteristics.slogan: Males give birth to up to 1,000 offspring!
